text:
@realDonaldTrump We see through you. You're the lowlife. By your refusal to do your job, you are directly responsible for tens of thousands of US Covid-19 deaths.
To top it off, the only 2 indoor large crowd gatherings in the US have been by YOU in Tulsa and AZ and just to feed your ego.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
